title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 28, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of William Blake (1757), who said, "The imagination is not a state: it is the human existence itself."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of William Blake (1757), who said, "The imagination is not a state: it is the human existence itself."
